title: inactivity in rank
body:
Hi i have been logging on for the past 5-7 days and this message has been popping up and been saying inactivity in rank when i have been playing ranked for 5-7 days and i"m afraid that my rank will drop.

how can i resolve this?

replies.body:
It means you need to play a flex game, as your flex rank is going to decay. 
Last time you played flex was ~a month ago, and [decay sets in for plat at around 28 days ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h3q1)

so no one is gonna help me

well thanks riot great company
